basic_info.description: I'm a dedicated professional UI/UX designer and full-stack web developer with expertise in MERN programming. I'm Goal-oriented and individually motivated. I work well on teams and I naturally take initiative in order to create and provide potential employers and clients with web applications that meet optimal functionality and expertly polished design. I consistently invest time and energy into expanding programming skills and maintains level of curiosity and precision.

projects.title: SkinDex
projects.description: Will allow users to take quiz that shows them a skincare routine base on their answers. This is my most extensive project, i used a lot of technologies and created the API.

projects.title: FitUp
projects.description: FitUp can be used to design your next workout.User is given a choice of indoor or outdoor workout and given options to add workouts and save them.

projects.title: UX/UI Beach Vacation
projects.description: This design is meant for users that are interested in taking beach vacation but do not know where to go. With a study i have found that users mainly go to vacations based on family or friends recommendation. If a booking site adds a feature like this it will increase the time spent on site as well as the amount of items booked with the site.
